rows.label: qst202020_msg0001
rows.name:
Can I ask you to buy me a sneaky
bit of Bitter Choclit on the side?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't ask Musubi or she'll just lecture
my lugs off.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0003
rows.name: She never buys the stuff for me.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0004
rows.name:
You're a crafty old man, you know
that?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0005
rows.name:
Fine. We'll get some of this choclit
for you.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah, would you mind buying us a
Fruity Rice Ball along with the choclit?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0008
rows.name: Where do we find these things?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0009
rows.name:
For choclit, you'll want to go to
Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0010
rows.name:
But Fruity Rice Balls? There's a dearth
of them these days.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0011
rows.name:
They used to be all over Gula.
Avaritia, too.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't know, maybe we'll see a
resurgence once trade improves.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0013
rows.name: All right. We'll find it somehow!

rows.label: qst202020_msg0014
rows.name: Thanks, lad. I'm counting on you!
